direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods manipulate the class attribute of elements, but in opposite directions.
Both methods involve toggling or modifying the class attribute of elements.
Both methods involve removing attributes from elements, with similar control flows and exception handling.
Both methods manipulate attributes of elements, but one sets and the other removes.
Both methods involve selecting elements based on certain criteria, though for different purposes.

enhanced_by.reason: Initialization of elements is required before manipulating their class attributes.
Adding a class before removing it can help in testing the removal functionality.
Checking if the class has been removed can validate the functionality of removeClass.
